titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the total amount appropriated for fiscal year 1996 for defense programs should not exceed the amount appropriated for those programs for fiscal year 1995 reduced by 10 percent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Acquisition.

bill.summary: 10/3/1994--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the total amount appropriated for FY 1996 for national defense programs should not exceed $236.43 billion (such amount representing a ten percent reduction from the FY 1995 amount).
